name: es6-module-starter
description: Boilerplate starter kit for ES6/Babel modules.

scripts.istanbul: npm run compile && istanbul cover --dir coverage/istanbul node_modules/argg dist/test/*.js --report lcovonly
scripts.coverage: npm run compile && istanbul cover --dir coverage/istanbul node_modules/argg dist/test/*.js --report html
scripts.test: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls

author: Daniel Couper <danielcouper@sutor-design.com>
